bibl.title: Late Roman Auditoria in Alexandria in the Light of Ivory Carvings. Avec résumé en anglais.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.author: RODZIEWICZ, Elzbieta

bibl.note: Suggests that the so-called Roman theatre and smaller auditoria in the same quarter of public buildings in Alexandria are public lecture halls, such as depicted on ivory and bone reliefs from the Byzantine period.
RODZIEWICZ Elzbieta, Late Roman Auditoria in Alexandria in the Light of Ivory Carvings. Avec résumé en anglais.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 269-279, pll. XLVIII-LI.
